Hydras:

by years without be noticed and what if is a trap?"

From: Super Cyclonus

Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> "I'm planning to built one"said dryly hydras

<NEW>

The large hovering robot continued to monitor the security station,
but as Hydras talked he glanced at Cryotek, his glance cool and
watchful, yet there was a certain amount of anticipation in it.

"Yes Obsidian, I know." Cryotek said out loud to the hovering security
officer. "Pull it up on screen."

Cryotek turned back to Hydras, "What if I told you that there was a
base that we have found that might serve your needs even better?"

On the screen the image of some large spaceship or vessel could be
seen buried, and almost totally obscured by stone and debris. From the
data that scrolled across the screen it was somewhere near what would
now be the India and pakistan borders.

"Look." Cryotek said as he gestured at the screen. "We have only just
recently descovered this."

(TAG)

Preston
